definition[0]: to say something in a way that shows you are thinking about it carefully
example[0]: ‘Somewhere, ’ he mused, ‘I’ve heard your name before.’
definition[1]: to think about something for a long time
example[1]: He mused on how different his life would have been, had he not met Louisa.
definition[2]: someone’s muse is the force or person that makes them want to write, paint, or make music, and helps them to have good ideas
definition[3]: one of the nine ancient Greek goddesses who each represented a particular art or science
